title: Completed PE Summary - Telesis/ Amenity
raw_html:

Registered Owner & Manager: Mr Robert Francis Quin
Port of registry: Southampton
Flag: UK
Type: Fishing vessel
Built: 1988
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 11.89
Gross tonnage: 20.05
Date & Time 04/01/04 11:34
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Near miss
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: None

Vessel name Amenity
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: FT Everard & Sons Ltd
Port of registry: London
Flag: UK
Type: Tanker/Combination carrier
Built: 1980
Length overall: 79.23
Gross tonnage: 1453.00
Date & Time 04/01/04 11:34
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Near miss
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

Near miss between fv Telesis & mv Amenity 4 miles east of Yorkshire coast.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector has recommended to the managers of Amenity:

To review system to ensure that, in accordance with STCW, dedicated lookout is maintained on its vessels at all times
